articles.author: Sumathi Bala
articles.title: China's zero-Covid policy could deal another blow to global supply chains, Moody's says - CNBC
articles.description: The challenges has been "with us for about a year now," said Katrina Ell is a senior economist for Asia-Pacific at Moody's Analytics.
articles.content:
Supply chain disruptions are being prolonged driven largely by China's strict zero-Covid policy, according to an economist from Moody's Analytics.
The bottlenecks have lasted for about a year now bu… [+2495 chars]

articles.title: Singapore PM backs continued exclusion of Myanmar junta from ASEAN meetings - Reuters
articles.description: Singapore's leader said the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) should continue excluding Myanmar's junta from its meeting until it cooperates on an agreed peace plans.
articles.content: SINGAPORE, Jan 15 (Reuters) - Singapore's leader said the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) should continue excluding Myanmar's junta from its meeting until it cooperates on an agreed pe… [+2419 chars]
